item.title: No title
item.description: As Christians, we all have the same challenge: “For the flesh lusts against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; and these are contrary to one another, so that you do not do the things that you wish.” (Gal. 5:17) But prior to this Paul writes: “I say then: Walk in the Spirit, and you shall not fulfill the lust of the flesh.” WE DON’T HAVE TO YIELD TO THE FLESH, FOR GOD HAS GIVEN US GRACE AND POWER TO WALK IN THE SPIRIT, BUT WE MUST BE WILLING TO DO IT HIS WAY AND NOT OUR OWN WAY!
